name: Bugging me
description:
Bugging Me is a simple but tricky platformer with a retro aesthetic. Playable on mobile!

Made for Game Off 2021 game jam https://itch.io/jam/game-off-2021.

Controls

Arrow keys to move (or use on-screen buttons for touchscreen devices).

Asset Credits

Sound - SubspaceAudio https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style

Teletactile font - heaven castro https://fontsme.com/teletactile.font

TeleTekst font - LeFly Fonts https://www.fontspace.com/teletekst-font-f6250
